message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $750,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider $925,000, which reflects its worth and leaves room for a fair deal.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $850,000. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
